EmailTemplate.name: SGN_16_PJ_VoilahFestival.Email - no win.Email - No win
EmailTemplate.subject: The winners have been found
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View this email in a web browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>

<[[#]]>
<[[#]]>
<[[#]]>
We're sorry you didn't win
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for your interest in our Lucky Draw contest for the Ballet of Superstars at the VOILAH! Festival. The winners have now been notified and we are sorry you weren't one of them.
If you don’t want to miss the show, you can still purchase tickets through VOILAH! <[[http://voilah.sg/superstar-ballet/]]>. Stay tuned for upcoming events with Perrier-Jouët.
Perrier-Jouët
<[[https://www.facebook.com/champagne.PerrierJouet/?brand_redir=254047521418430]]>
<[[https://www.instagram.com/perrierjouet/]]>
<[[https://www.pinterest.com/perrierjouet/]]>
<[[https://twitter.com/perrierjouet?lang=en]]>
<[[https://www.youtube.com/user/PerrierJouet?gl=SG&hl=en-GB]]>
You have previously provided Pernod Ricard with your personal data to be used in accordance with our Privacy Policy <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGN_Perrier-Jouet-Generic-Registration_Page---Privacy-Policy.html]]>. Occasionally, we will send marketing communications to you regarding special offers and events that we believe may be relevant and useful to you. If you wish to unsubscribe to these communications, please click here <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>.
